p: Finally, as for study case A (influenza), at the much slower LOI rate γ in = 0.00055 (LOI period of 5 years), the seasonal cycle takes much longer to stabilize, and oscillations proceed at intermittent intensities both in the northern and southern hemisphere (with different phases) for tens of years and then finally synchronize to the solar cycles on timescales longer than 50 years ( Figure 8).
